title: The Homebody’s Lover - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Historical   Josei   Mature   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Ancient China   Female Protagonist   Love Triangles   Misunderstandings   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Transmigration
author: 月斜影清
description: Misunderstandings push her and Li Huan farther from each other.  Ye Jia’s appearance completely captures her heart.  He is the young master of a wealthy family, a celebrated scholar, the gentlest lover.  He is an idiot who turns bad for her, a little prince who will watch the sunset by her side.   Facing the love rival of his former existence that is bound to win, Li Huan is rendered speechless.  Lost in Ye Jia’s warmth, how will the independant her react to Li Huan’s clingy attachment.   The road ahead is difficult, can she and Ye Jia be together?>
